27324130.VoiceDir19.6D03F: Referring to a coffin that they must seek to find out how Elias gained his immortality.

27FCB7D0.Line7.6D03F: And when I told him to wait, he called me a fool, said we had to do whatever--

8E083E4E.Line5.6D03F: Prophecies are riddles; not even the very wise can be sure of their meaning. But Elias believed he could solve it.

8F54F740.Line25.6D03F: Tried, yes. And failed. It’ll be different this time.

F413C4CC.Line3.6D03F: The moment Elias heard Rathma’s prophecy, it poisoned him. He became obsessed with it.
